problems.text: A tank is filled with 10 liters of water every 30 minutes. How much water is added after 6 intervals?
problems.hint: This is a constant (not arithmetic) sequence. Each interval adds 10 liters.
steps: Identify the amount added per interval (a = 10)
Use the formula: S_n = n × a

problems.text: A plant grows 3 cm each week. If it was 5 cm tall at the start, how tall will it be after 8 weeks?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. The plant grows 3 cm taller each week.
steps: Use the formula: Height = a + (n - 1) × d

problems.text: A brick tower increases by 3 bricks per layer. The first layer has 7 bricks. How many bricks are in the 20th layer?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. Each layer has 3 more bricks than the previous layer.

problems.text: A student saves ₱200 in the first month and increases the amount saved by ₱50 each month. How much will he save in the 6th month?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. Each month, the amount saved increases by ₱50.
steps: Use the formula: Saving = a + (n - 1) × d
